verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:15
verses.text: The twelfth captain for the twelfth month was Heldai the Netophathite, of Othniel: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:16
verses.text: Furthermore over the tribes of Israel: the ruler of the Reubenites was Eliezer the son of Zichri: of the Simeonites, Shephatiah the son of Maachah:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:17
verses.text: Of the Levites, Hashabiah the son of Kemuel: of the Aaronites, Zadok:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:18
verses.text: Of Judah, Elihu, one of the brethren of David: of Issachar, Omri the son of Michael:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:19
verses.text: Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
